name: TheAltiDudes
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

The AltiDudes is a podcast about adventure, community and a bunch of other stuff. We want to cover our past adventures together and alone. Maybe even obtain some stories from you guys listening. We are also going to use this Podcast as a space for us to air out anything that may relate to you, the listeners. We may even play some games, talk movies, music, maybe even current events.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
